alert.note: Alert for Malheur (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued June 06 at 8:46PM PDT until June 06 at 9:45PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: The National Weather Service in Boise has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Payette County in southwestern Idaho... Northern Canyon County in southwestern Idaho... Southwestern Gem County in southwestern Idaho... Northeastern Malheur County in southeastern Oregon... * Until 1045 PM MDT. * At 946 PM MDT, a wall of dust was along a line extending from Emmett to near Notus to near Homedale, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Less than one half mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * Interstate 84 is being affected by this dust storm. This wall of dust will be near... Letha around 1000 PM MDT. Parma, New Plymouth, French Corner and Adrian around 1020 PM MDT. Fruitland and Owyhee around 1030 PM MDT. Payette, Ontario and Nyssa around 1040 PM MDT. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake. Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
